member.name: T:Lucene.Net.Search.Regex.RegexTermEnum
member.summary:
Subclass of FilteredTermEnum for enumerating all terms that match the specified regular expression term using the specified regular expression implementation.
Term enumerations are always ordered by Term.compareTo(). Each term in the enumeration is greater than all that precede it.

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Search.Regex.RegexTermEnum.TermCompare(Lucene.Net.Index.Term)
member.summary: Equality compare on the term

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Search.Regex.RegexTermEnum.Difference
member.summary: Equality measure on the term

member.name: M:Lucene.Net.Search.Regex.RegexTermEnum.EndEnum
member.summary: Indicates the end of the enumeration has been reached

member.summary: A wise prefix implementation can reduce the term enumeration (and thus performance) of RegexQuery dramatically.
member.returns: static non-regex prefix of the pattern last passed to . May return null
